channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Description Column Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Description Column Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2266|2024-08-04T07:01:41.170Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20description%20column%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Description Column Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the job description in the column tooltip, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
